price: (27) Indeed, these [disbelievers] love the immediate and leave behind them[1814] a grave Day.
arabic: إِنَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ يُحِبُّونَ ٱلۡعَاجِلَةَ وَيَذَرُونَ وَرَآءَهُمۡ يَوۡمٗا ثَقِيلٗا
footnotes: [1814]- i.e., neglect.  The meaning may also be "leave ahead of them."

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: inna hāulāi yuḥibbūna al-ʿājilata wayadharūna warāahum yawman thaqīlan
